```
â””â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”˜

â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

Example Flow: Frontend-Only Change

1. Developer changes: frontend/src/App.jsx
2. CI Manager triggered on PR
3. paths-filter analyzes: âœ… frontend=true, âŒ contracts=false, 
                          âŒ docs=false, âŒ security=false
4. Jobs executed:
   - â­ï¸ smart-contract-tests: Skipped (no contract changes)
   - âœ… frontend-tests: Running (frontend changed)
   - â­ï¸ docs-build: Skipped (no doc changes)
   - â­ï¸ security-analysis: Skipped (no security changes, not main)
5. Time saved: ~10-15 minutes
6. Summary posted to PR

â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•

Key Benefits:

ğŸ’° Cost Savings
   - Reduced CI minutes usage
   - Lower infrastructure costs
   
âš¡ Speed
   - Faster feedback for developers
   - Quicker PR merge times
   
ğŸ¯ Precision
   - Only run necessary tests
   - Maintain coverage where needed
   
ğŸ”’ Security
   - Security tests always run on main
   - Contract changes always trigger security
   
ğŸ“Š Transparency
   - Clear summaries of what runs
   - Visibility into why tests skipped

â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•â•
```

## File Structure

```
.github/workflows/
â”œâ”€â”€ ci-manager.yml              # Main orchestration workflow
â”œâ”€â”€ ci-config.yml               # Path pattern configuration
â”œâ”€â”€ test.yml                    # Contract tests (reusable)
â”œâ”€â”€ security-testing.yml        # Security analysis (reusable)
â”œâ”€â”€ deploy-docs.yml             # Docs deployment (independent)
â”œâ”€â”€ deploy-contracts.yml        # Contract deployment (independent)
â”œâ”€â”€ README.md                   # Complete documentation
â”œâ”€â”€ QUICKSTART.md               # Quick reference guide
â””â”€â”€ CI_MANAGER_TEST_SCENARIOS.md # Test scenarios
```

## Configuration Flow

```
ci-config.yml (patterns) â”€â”€â–¶ ci-manager.yml (filters) â”€â”€â–¶ Job execution
                                       â”‚
                                       â–¼
                              Change detection outputs
                                       â”‚
                    â”Œâ”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”¼â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”
                    â–¼                  â–¼                  â–¼
              contracts=true    frontend=true      docs=true
                    â”‚                  â”‚                  â”‚
                    â–¼                  â–¼                  â–¼
            Run contract tests  Run frontend tests  Build docs
```

## Decision Logic

```
For each job:

smart-contract-tests:
  IF contracts==true OR core==true
    THEN run test.yml
    ELSE skip

frontend-tests:
  IF frontend==true OR core==true
    THEN run inline frontend jobs
    ELSE skip

docs-build:
  IF docs==true
    THEN run inline docs build
    ELSE skip

security-analysis:
  IF security==true OR branch==main
    THEN run security-testing.yml
    ELSE skip
```

## Integration with Existing Workflows

```
Before CI Manager:
â”Œâ”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”
â”‚ PR Created â”‚
â””â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”¬â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”˜
      â”‚
      â”œâ”€â”€â–¶ test.yml (always runs)
      â”œâ”€â”€â–¶ security-testing.yml (always runs)
      â””â”€â”€â–¶ deploy-docs.yml (on main only)

After CI Manager:
â”Œâ”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”
â”‚ PR Created â”‚
â””â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”¬â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”˜
      â”‚
      â–¼
â”Œâ”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”
â”‚  CI Manager    â”‚ â—€â”€â”€ Smart orchestration
â””â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”¬â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”€â”˜
      â”‚
      â”œâ”€â”€â–¶ test.yml (conditional)
      â”œâ”€â”€â–¶ security-testing.yml (conditional)
      â”œâ”€â”€â–¶ frontend tests (conditional, inline)
      â”œâ”€â”€â–¶ docs build (conditional, inline)
      â””â”€â”€â–¶ ci-summary (always)

Existing workflows still work independently when triggered directly!
```
